title: ‘War for the Planet of the Apes’ First Look: Matt Reeves Teases Fans of the 1968 Classic
text:
‘War for the Planet of the Apes’ First Look: Matt Reeves Teases Fans of the 1968 Classic 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
Production on War for the Planet of the Apes, the sequel to last year’s Dawn of the Planet of the Apes, has begun. Director Matt Reeves is...
